techmeme.title: Sam Altman says OpenAI plans to kick off a "shipmas" period of features and products for 12 days on December 5, sources say including text-to-video AI tool Sora (The Verge)
An interview with PlayStation co-CEOs Hermen Hulst and Hideaki Nishino on AI in gaming, "preserving the human touch" in game development, Astro Bot, and more (Tom Gerken/BBC)
DC's AG sues Amazon for allegedly secretly stopping its fastest delivery service to the nearly 50K Prime subscribers in historically lower-income neighborhoods (Cecilia Kang/New York Times)
Sources: Apple and Baidu are working to add AI features to Chinese iPhones but have clashed over model training data, and the models have struggled with prompts (The Information)
iVerify says its Mobile Threat Hunting tool, launched in May 2024, found seven Pegasus infections after scanning 2,500 devices, some owned by business leaders (Lily Hay Newman/Wired)
